description: This file contains end-to-end tests for a graph editor application, verifying user interactions and performance using Playwright testing framework.

methods.name: read-only toggle disables editing actions
methods.description: Test that toggling read-only mode disables editing buttons in the toolbar.

methods.name: shortcuts overlay toggles
methods.description: Test that clicking the shortcuts button shows the shortcuts overlay.

methods.name: import/export buttons are present
methods.description: Test that import and export buttons are visible in the toolbar.

methods.name: can add multiple nodes quickly and HUD visible
methods.description: Test adding multiple nodes rapidly and check if the HUD with FPS is visible.

methods.name: basic performance baseline: render completes within time budget
methods.description: Test that initial page load and rendering complete within 2 seconds.
